clause.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a part of a written law or legal document covering a particular subject of the whole law or document
clause.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: A confidentiality clause was added to the contract.
clause.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a group of words that contains a subject and a verb, but which is usually only part of a sentence
clause.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a part of a written law, contract, or legal document that deals with a particular item or subject
clause.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Clause 12 enables the Secretary of State to make orders to protect pension rights.
